channel.title: Class Creator, as if by Magic
channel.description:
Do you want to make a class but lack the imagination to come up with a name?
http://www.generatorland.com/usergenerator.aspx?id=19473
This has you covered
now featuring an ability generator
http://www.generatorland.com/usergenerator.aspx?id=19474
sample class: # The Drug Dealer - Unseen Investigative Respond (Night) - Present 53 players then Expedite 5 players Flick (Day) - Prepare 22 players then Prod 34 players Roll (Passive) - Mutilate 80 players then Coordinate 32 players

item.description:
The Geographer

Neutral Killer
Whirl (Passive) - Take 83 players then Increase 50 players

Gather (Passive) - Judge 56 players then Apprehend 74 players

Shock (Day) - Whistle 84 players then Diagnose 82 players

Consolidate (Day) - Understand 47 players then Start 50 players

Translate (Night) - Soak 83 players then Tap 17 players

Whip (Night) - Shoot 31 players then Presented 66 players
You win when Jammy makes an automatic Neutral wincon generator
